rules.justification: Set as warning: To improve readability the name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
Disable: 'This' keyword is currently broken and we are not using it.
Disable: Internals visible - we know how to use it... Not necessary to show the warning...
Disable: App-Source range - for app source apps only
Disable: Internals visible - we know how to use it... Not necessary to show the warning...
Disable: We are not using Application Insights for all project, suppress if not used.
Disable: In recent versions flowfields are not editable by default.
Set as warning: Commit() needs a comment to justify its existence. Either a leading or a trailing comment
Set as warning: Do not use an Object ID for properties or variables declaration.
Set as warning: Property LookupPageID and DrilldownPageID must be filled in table because it is used in list page.
Set as warning: Wrong casing detected.
Set as error: Set as warning: AutoIncrement fields are not possible in temporary tables.
Disable: DataPerCompany is missing.
Set as error: Filter operators should not be used in SetRange. Use SetFilter instead.
Disable: Cyclomatic complexity and Maintainability index (within the limits).
Set as warning: Cyclomatic complexity and Maintainability index (over the limits).
Disable: Access property is missing.
Set as warning: Wrong Parameter detected.
Set as error: NotBlank should be set explicitly for tables with a single-field primary key..
Set as warning: The Caption of permissionset objects should not exceed the maximum length.
We are using only TableData permissions.
Set as warning: Caption is missing.
Set as error: Writing to a FlowField is not common. Add a comment to explain this.
Set as warning: Events in internal codeunits are not accessible to extensions and should therefore be avoided.
Set as warning: Data Classification is equal to the Table. Remove to reduce redundancy.
Set as warning: Application Area is equal to the Page. Remove to reduce redundancy.
Set as warning: Confirm() must be implemented through the 'Confirm Management' codeunit from the System Application.
Set as warning: GlobalLanguage() must be implemented through the 'Translation Helper' codeunit from the Base Application.
Set as warning: Fieldgroup '{0}' is missing on table '{1}'.
We do not use semicolon at the end of the procedure definition.
Disable: Procedure must be either local, internal or define a documentation comment.
Set as warning: ToolTip must end with a dot.
Set as warning: Utilize the 'Page Management' codeunit for launching page.
Set as warning: Event subscriber arguments now use identifier syntax instead of string literals.
Set as warning: Use CompareDateTime method in Type Helper codeunit for DateTime variable comparisons.
Set as warning: Set Access property to Internal for Install/Upgrade codeunits.
Set as error: Set ReadIsolation property instead of LockTable method..
Set as warning: Clear(All) does not affect or change values for global variables in '{0}: Codeunit {1}'.

Disable (we want to leave app compatible with previous versions as long as possible): The specified runtime version in app.json is falling behind. The project targets {0} version {1} and the current runtime is {2}. Update the runtime to {3} for compatibility with the latest runtime features.
Disable: The property Extensible should be explicitly set for {0} objects.
Set as warning: Explicitly set AllowInCustomizations for fields omitted on pages.
Set as warning: ToolTip must start with the verb 'Specifies'.
Set as warning: Do not use line breaks in ToolTip.
If we have longer tooltip, it has reason.
Set as error: Argument {0}: cannot convert from {1} to {2}.
Set as warning: Explicitly set the RunTrigger parameter on build-in methods.
Set as warning: Empty captions should be locked.
Set as error: The SetAutoCalcFields method should only be used with FlowFields or fields of type Blob. The field {0} is not a FlowField or of type Blob.
Set as warning: Use SecretText type to protect credentials and sensitive textual values from being revealed.
Set as warning: Records '{0}' and '{1}' have conflicting fields with the same ID.
Disable: We know that 0 enum value should be used for blank value. If we have different value, it is by design.
Set as warning: Label with suffix Tok must be locked.
Set as warning: Locked Label must have a suffix Tok.
Set as warning: Use Error with a ErrorInfo or Label variable to improve telemetry details.
Set as warning: SourceTable property not defined on {0} '{1}'.
Set as warning: Found operator '{0}' together with placeholder '{1}' in filter expression, which results in unexpected behavior. Use the StrSubstNo() method to circumvent this..
Set as warning: Do not assign a text to a target with smaller size.
Set as warning: The internal method is declared but never used.
Disable: The internal method is only used in the object in which it is declared.
Set as warning: The suffix 'Tok' is meant to be used when the value of the label matches the name.
Set as error: Empty Enum values should not have a specified Caption property.
Set as error: Enum values must have non-empty a Caption to be selectable in the client.
Set as error: PageVariable.SetRecord(): You cannot use a temporary record for the Record parameter.
Set as error: Single quote escaping issue detected.
Set as warning: The ApplicationArea property is not applicable to API pages.
Set as warning: Pages of type API must have the ODataKeyFields property set to the SystemId field.
Set as warning: Mandatory field is missing on API page.
Set as warning: Consider naming field with a more descriptive name.
Set as warning: Missing ToolTip property on table field.
Set as warning: Event subscriber var keyword mismatch.
Set as warning: Duplicate ToolTip between page and table field.
Error: Set NotBlank property to false when 'No. Series' TableRelation exists.
Disable: The current object is missing indirect permissions permissions.
Disable: Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.
Error: Zero index access on 1-based List objects.
Error: Incorrect 'IsHandled' parameter assignment.
Warning: The documentation comment must match the procedure syntax.
Error: Handled parameters in event signatures should be passed by var.
Error: Set values for FlowFilter fields using filtering methods.
Error: Incorrect number or type of arguments in .Get() method on Record object.
Error: The field with table relation should have at least the same length as the referenced field.
Warning: Methods should always be called with parenthesis.
Error: Temporary records should not trigger table triggers.
Warning: Event publishers should not be public.
Error: Replace double quotes in JPath expressions with two single quotes.
Warning: Use Rec.IsEmpty() for checking record existence.
Disable: Use Rec.Find('-') with Rec.Next() for checking exactly one record.
Warning: Use new Date/Time/DateTime methods for extracting parts.
Disable: Use return value for better error handling.
Warning: Use the (CR)LFSeparator from the Type Helper codeunit.
Warning: Use the new PageStyle datatype instead string literals.
